Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: The people are buzzing about the budget lock-up article by Chris Kohler with pleasant comments everywhere. There are mixed feelings about supporting households and businesses in electrifying and enhancing energy efficiency with many opposing the Dutton Reply. Peter Dutton criticizes the tax increase on Australians investing in their super and the overall tax increase in the budget. However Peter Dutton appreciates the measures of aged care interest rates and 2 million jobs created over nine years. He also highlights the Coalition's focus on strengthening the economy and keeping Australia safe and secure.
